## getVertexBufferLength() function

Get the length of a vertex buffer by specified structure type of the vertex buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function getVertexBufferLength(vertexBufferType: PBStructTypeInfo): number;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

[PBStructTypeInfo](doc/markdown/./device.pbstructtypeinfo.md)


</td><td>

The structure type of the vertex buffer


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number
